content:
alexcrichton opened PR #11312 from alexcrichton:more-unsafe-op-in-unsafe-fn to bytecodealliance:main:

Slowly expanding this lint to more of the crate.

alexcrichton requested dicej for a review on PR #11312.

alexcrichton edited PR #11312:

Slowly expanding this lint to more of the crate.

cc #11180
